entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The main character's mentor and a powerful wizard who fought against the Dark Arts. He is described as someone who stopped Grindelwald, voted for Muggle protection and rights, and fought You-Know-Who from the start.

entities.name: grindelwald
entities.description: A dark wizard that Dumbledore stopped. He is mentioned as someone who was defeated by Dumbledore.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: The main antagonist, also known as Voldemort. Dumbledore fought against him from the start and died trying to bring him down.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is angry because Dumbledore never told him about his past actions.

entities.name: rita
entities.description: Someone who wrote a book about Dumbledore's life. The book lies on the ground between Harry and another person.

relationships.description: Dumbledore stopped Grindelwald, as mentioned in the text: 'The one who stopped Grindelwald...'
Dumbledore fought against You-Know-Who from the start, as mentioned in the text: 'The one who always voted for Muggle protection and Muggle born rights, who fought You-Know-Who from the start...'
Dumbledore died trying to bring down You-Know-Who, as mentioned in the text: '...and who died trying to bring him down!'

Harry is angry with Dumbledore because he never told him about his past actions, as mentioned in the text: 'I think the real reason you're so angry is that Dumbledore never told you any of this himself.'
